body_html:
Many thanks!
…
On Fri, Apr 6, 2018, 10:05 PM Wenda Zhou ***@***.***> wrote: @TylerBalsam <https://github.com/TylerBalsam> I have implemented the CUDNN grouped conv API for DepthwiseConv in #17961 <#17961>, you can give it a try if you are willing to compile yourself. I get a significant speed-up for MobileNet (my main application), especially in 16-bit training. — You are receiving this because you were mentioned. body:
Many thanks!

On Fri, Apr 6, 2018, 10:05 PM Wenda Zhou <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> @TylerBalsam <https://github.com/TylerBalsam> I have implemented the
> CUDNN grouped conv API for DepthwiseConv in #17961
> <https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/17961>, you can give it a
> try if you are willing to compile yourself. I get a significant speed-up
> for MobileNet (my main application), especially in 16-bit training.
>
